EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for spending time with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for attending the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow in Hartford on November 16th, 2016. We hope our event provided you clear perspective on the process and technology of cloud-native organizations.
We have made our presentation slides available for download below:
- Transforming How the World Builds Software <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/transforming how the world builds software-hartford.pdf]]> - How Platforms Work <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/how-platforms-work-v2-hartford.pdf]]> - Building Cloud-Native Architectures with Spring <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/building cloud-native architectures with spring-hartford.pdf]]>
If you are interested in having Pivotal present cloud-native content to your organization or want to learn more about Pivotal, contact us <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a follow up with our team.
Thank you again for joining us!
The Pivotal Team
If you want to see more in-depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us again at next year's SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io/]]>, taking place December 4â€”7, 2017 in San Francisco.
